caption.p: Volcano plot map of lncRNAs expression in BVDV-infected MDBK cells compared to mock-infected cells. The abscissa indicates the log of the difference multiple between two samples; the ordinate indicates the negative Log 10 value of the FDR of two samples; the red points (up-regulation) and green points (down-regulation) indicate the differences in gene expression (judgment criteria: FDR < 0.05; the difference multiple is more than twice). Black dots indicate that there is no difference
